reviews.review_msg: Not recommended. The material itself is not extremely difficult, however, the prof is really unclear and seems to contradict himself often (when it comes to expectations of exams etc). Also takes forever to hand back assignments, which can be really irritating if you don't know what he expects out of you. Also the lectures were very vague.
Good teacher!! Humorous and always ready for help. Although accent may cause confusion, but he try to explain all the concept well clearly.BTW,You do need to attend classes if you want a high  mark.
Best prof Ive ever met. He is funny and very knowledgable. His mts are fair. The average is 70%. He always teaches us things in an easy way. Very recommended.
